name: C.A.V.E
description:
Surviving on an alien planet can be hard - even for an alien. Try to make the best of the situation. Collect the eggs and avoid the unfriendly astronauts. The small green creatures hatching from the eggs are deadly. They like to feed on astronauts and grow quickly. Big green creatures are docile and very valuable.

Control the alien by the mouse. The game may also be played on a touch device.

Does not work on Firefox.

The game is originally called Monster Mayhem and was created by Rex van der Spuy.
